= 部分常用示例 =

== Paragraphs ==
Use one or more blank lines to separate paragraphs. 

== Typeface ==
||Name/Sample || *Markup* ||  
|| _italic_ || {{{_italic_}}}  ||
|| *bold* || {{{*bold*}}}  ||
|| `code` || {{{`code`}}}  ||
|| {{{code}}} || {{{ {{{code}}} }}} ||  
|| ^super^script || {{{^super^script}}} || 
|| ,,sub,,script || {{{,,sub,,script}}}  ||
|| ~~strikeout~~ || {{{~~strikeout~~}}}  ||
